## ğŸ§˜â€â™€ï¸ About Me

I've been diving even deeper into coding, exploring new languages, frameworks, and tools to bring my ideas to life in even more creative ways. When I'm not doing that, you'll usually find me either in Unity and Blender on VR world development, or streaming ASMR on [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/SweetSamanthaVR) and [Kick](https://kick.com/SweetSamanthaVR), helping everyone take a moment to relax and unwind. I'm always chasing those random "what if?" ideas, turning them into little experiments, tools, or experiences that are genuinely fun, useful, and sometimes a little unexpected. This GitHub is my playground, a place for me to tinker, share projects, and try out new ideas, all while having a bit of fun along the way.
